original: @112a # // thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan @112b ras gzigs //
analyzed: @112a # // thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan @112b ras gzigs //

original: 'gro la nye ring med pas khyad du 'phags //
analyzed: 'gro la nye ring med pas khyad du 'phags //
translated: Superior due to impartiality towards beings,

original: sems can rnams la spyan ras gzigs mdzod la //
analyzed: sems can rnams la spyan ras gzigs mdzod la //
translated: Look upon sentient beings with compassion,

original: kun gyis rang ngo shes par byin gyis rlobs //
analyzed: kun gyis rang ngo shes par byin gyis rlobs //
translated: Bless us all to recognize our own nature.

original: rang don du chos sku rtogs pa //
analyzed: rang don du chos sku rtogs pa //
translated: Having realized the dharmakaya for one's own benefit,

original: gzhan don du gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis kyis /
analyzed: gzhan don du gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis kyis /
translated: For the benefit of others, through the two aspects of the rupakaya,

original: mthong thos dran reg gi sgo nas /
analyzed: mthong thos dran reg gi sgo nas /
translated: By seeing, hearing, remembering, or touching,

original: 'gro ba yongs la pan thogs pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba yongs la pan thogs pa /
translated: May we be of benefit to all beings,

original: 'gro ba yongs kyi don rlabs po che 'grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
analyzed: 'gro ba yongs kyi don rlabs po che 'grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
translated: Bless us to accomplish the vast benefit of all beings.

original: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
analyzed: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /

analyzed: nam a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /

original: bo dhisa tv'a ya /
analyzed: bo dhisa tv'a ya /

original: ma h'a satv'a ya /
analyzed: ma h'a satv'a ya /

original: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
analyzed: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /

original: tadya th'a / aom tsakra bartti /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom tsakra bartti /

original: tsint'a ma ni /
analyzed: tsint'a ma ni /

original: ma h'a padma ru ru tishtha /
analyzed: ma h'a padma ru ru tishtha /

original: dzva la a'a k'arsha /
analyzed: dzva la a'a k'arsha /

original: ya / h'um phata sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ya / h'um phata sv'a h'a /

original: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so //
